full_description:
OVO JX188-7B Mid Tower RGB Gaming Case

The OVO JX188-7B Mid Tower RGB Gaming Case is compatible with ATX, M-ATX, and ITX motherboards. This Gaming Case offers a range of I/O ports, including 1 x USB 3.0, 2 x USB 1.1, HD Audio & Mic, Reset Button, and Power Button. The case features a robust 0.5mm steel structure, complemented by a sleek tempered glass left side panel secured with four screws, and a front panel featuring RGB lighting within plastic housing. It has a PSU position at the bottom, supporting ATX power supplies of up to 180mm in length. The OVO JX188-7B Mid Tower RGB Gaming Case prioritizes cooling with room for three 120mm or two 140mm fans on the front, two 120mm fans on the top, and one 120mm fan on the rear, ensuring optimal airflow. It also supports front radiators of up to 240mm and rear radiators of 120mm for liquid cooling setups. The OVO JX188-7B case supports two 3.5" HDDs and two 2.5" SSDs. It allows a maximum VGA length of 330mm and a CPU height of up to 160mm, making it suitable for high-performance builds. The OVO JX188-7B also provides seven expansion slots for future upgrades and includes dust filters at the top and bottom to keep the interior clean.

full_description:
OVO JX188-7W Mid Tower RGB Gaming Case

The OVO JX188-7W Mid Tower RGB Gaming Case is compatible with ATX, M-ATX, and ITX motherboards. This Gaming Case offers a range of I/O ports, including 1 x USB 3.0, 2 x USB 1.1, HD Audio & Mic, Reset Button, and Power Button. The case features a robust 0.5mm steel structure, complemented by a sleek tempered glass left side panel secured with four screws, and a front panel featuring RGB lighting within plastic housing. It has a PSU position at the bottom, supporting ATX power supplies of up to 180mm in length. The OVO JX188-7W Mid Tower RGB Gaming Case prioritizes cooling with room for three 120mm or two 140mm fans on the front, two 120mm fans on the top, and one 120mm fan on the rear, ensuring optimal airflow. It also supports front radiators of up to 240mm and rear radiators of 120mm for liquid cooling setups. The OVO JX188-7W case supports two 3.5" HDDs and two 2.5" SSDs. It allows a maximum VGA length of 330mm and a CPU height of up to 160mm, making it suitable for high-performance builds. The OVO JX188-7W also provides seven expansion slots for future upgrades and includes dust filters at the top and bottom to keep the interior clean.

OVO SEA VIEW K18B Mid Tower RGB Gaming Case Without Fan

The OVO SEA VIEW K18B Mid Tower RGB Gaming Case is a sleek and stylish computer case designed to enhance your gaming setup while providing excellent functionality. This mid-tower case offers a panoramic view of your gaming rig with its tempered glass left-side panel, allowing you to showcase your high-performance components and RGB lighting. The OVO SEA VIEW K18B is compatible with a range of motherboard sizes, including ATX, Micro ATX, and Mini ITX, giving you the flexibility to choose the motherboard that suits your gaming needs. The tempered glass left side panel not only adds a touch of elegance to your setup but also provides durability and protection for your components. The sleek design of the case complements any gaming environment. The case features a front panel with convenient access to essential ports. It includes two USB 2.0 ports, one USB 3.0 port for faster data transfer, and one audio port for connecting headphones or a microphone. The OVO SEA VIEW K18B offers ample storage options to accommodate your gaming and storage needs. It includes space for three 2.5" SSDs, allowing you to store your games and applications on high-speed solid-state drives. Additionally, it can accommodate either three 3.5" HDDs or one 2.5" SSD, providing versatile storage configurations to suit your preferences. While this case does not come with built-in fans, it offers you the freedom to choose and install your preferred cooling solution, whether it's air cooling or a custom liquid cooling setup, to ensure optimal thermal performance for your gaming components. The OVO SEA VIEW K18B RGB Gaming Case offers enough storage space, you can either install three 2.5" SSDs or one 2.5" SSD and one 3.5" HDD.

full_description:
OVO J-618 B Acrylic RGB Mini-Tower mATX Gaming Casing

The OVO J-618 B Acrylic RGB Mini-Tower mATX Gaming Case is a sleek and stylish option for gamers and PC builders who prioritize both aesthetics and functionality. This compact and visually appealing case is designed to accommodate various motherboard sizes, including Micro-ATX, ITX, and Mini-ITX, providing flexibility for different builds. Pre-installed with two 120mm RGB fans, the OVO J-618 B not only enhances the visual appeal of your setup but also ensures efficient cooling to keep your components running smoothly. The case features a mesh front panel that allows optimal airflow and a side panel made of acrylic glass, offering a clear view of the internal components and dynamic RGB lighting. Equipped with front I/O ports, including two USB ports and two 3.5mm audio jacks, this case ensures easy connectivity for your peripherals. Its design is both user-friendly and efficient, making it a great choice for both novice and experienced builders. The OVO J-618 B supports a range of cooling options, with additional fan slots available for enhanced cooling performance. The casing also provides ample space for multiple storage drives and offers excellent cable management, keeping the interior neat and organized. The OVO J-618 B is constructed with durability in mind, featuring sturdy materials that ensure longevity. The RGB lighting system is customizable, allowing users to personalize their setup according to their preferences, further enhancing the case's aesthetic appeal. The compact design of the OVO J-618 B makes it suitable for small spaces, yet it does not compromise functionality or expandability, with multiple expansion slots for additional components. The OVO J-618 B Acrylic RGB Mini-Tower mATX Gaming Case is an ideal choice for gamers and PC enthusiasts who want a case that combines style and performance. Whether building a new gaming rig or upgrading your current setup, this case offers the perfect blend of form and function, delivering a visually impressive and highly functional solution for your computing needs.
